title: Staff - CS W186
meta_description: A listing of all the course staff members.
main_content: Staff Instructors Lakshya Jain lakshya.jain@berkeley.edu Pronouns: he/him/his OH: Friday 4PM - 5PM (Soda 283H) Hello everyone! I’m super excited to be your instructor this semester. I did my undergrad and Masters’ at Berkeley and taught 186 for four semesters as a TA, including a couple as head TA, before graduating and coming back as a lecturer. In my free time, I love to play and watch sports and do political analysis, and I play on the Cal Cricket team. Go bears! Head Teaching Assistants Kaitlyn Lee klee376@berkeley.edu Pronouns: she/her/hers OH: Thursday 7PM - 8PM (Admin) Hello, I’m Kaitlyn! I’m a 4th year EECS major from the Bay Area. I like to experiment with cooking and find new boba places to try. Looking forward to a great semester! Dylan Tran dylantran@berkeley.edu Pronouns: he/him/his OH: Friday 1PM - 3PM Hi - I’m Dylan! I’m a 4th year CS major from San Jose. In my free time, I like speedcubing, learning new piano songs without ever finishing, and camping. Super excited to meet you all this semester :D Sabrina Zhao yifanzhao0210@berkeley.edu Pronouns: she/her/hers Section: Friday 10AM - 11AM Wheeler 200 OH: Thursday 6PM – 8PM hihi! I’m a senior studying CS+ORMS. I like traveling, thrifting, and trying out new restaurants in my free time. Can’t wait to start this semester with you all :D Teaching Assistants Sarthak Arora sarthakarora@berkeley.edu Section: TBD (Online) OH: Tuesday 12PM - 2:30PM Hello! I am a rising senior studying CS and DS. Let’s have a great semester! Jen Buja jlbuja@berkeley.edu Pronouns: she/her/hers Section: Thursday 4PM - 5PM Evans 3 OH: Thursday 10AM - 11:30AM Hi there! I’m a rising senior studying CS. My favorite activities are hiking, cooking, and playing volleyball! Excited to meet everyone this semester! David Chu thedavidchu@berkeley.edu Pronouns: he/him/his Section: Friday 2PM - 3PM Wheeler 220 OH: Thursday 1PM - 3PM Hello. I’m a 2nd year PhD doing research in distributed systems. I will be eager to converse if the topic of discussion is Beethoven or the two generals problem. Thank you. Rithvik Chuppala rithvik.chuppala@berkeley.edu Section: Friday 4PM - 5PM Wheeler 220 OH: Friday, 9AM -10AM Hi! I’m a 3rd year majoring EECS from the Bay Area. My recent pastime activities include watching soccer and basketball, playing video games and watching movies with friends. Looking forward to a great semester back! Sai Gantla sgantla@berkeley.edu Pronouns: he/him/his Section: Wednesday 8AM -9AM Soda 405 OH: Thursday 3PM - 4:30PM Welcome to 186! Currently trying to learn how to cook and read. Ada Hu adahu@berkeley.edu Pronouns: she/her/hers Section: Friday 1PM - 2PM Wheeler 204 OH: Monday 4PM - 6PM Hi everyone! I’m a senior from Los Angeles, CA. I like playing League, tennis, and Stardew Valley. I also love cats! During the semester, you can probably find me at Asha tea house or Moffitt first floor. Raymond Ji raymondji@berkeley.edu Pronouns: he/him/his OH: Wednesday 2PM - 4PM Let’s have a great semester! Kayli Jiang kaylijiang@berkeley.edu Section: Wednesday 2PM - 3PM Wheeler 220 OH: Wednesday 3PM - 4:30PM Hey everyone! I’m Kayli, a 4th year studying CS from the Bay Area. I enjoy baking pastries, calisthenics, and watching comedy TV shows. Let’s have a fun time in-person this semester! Shreyas Krishnaswamy shrekris@berkeley.edu Pronouns: he/him/his Section: TBD (Online) OH: Monday 5:30PM - 7PM Hi there! I’m a fourth year, and I enjoy reading books, playing video games (if only I could play Civ V at 2x speed :), and chilling with friends. Welcome to 186, and let’s have a great semester! Sharon Lee sharonleesharon@berkeley.edu Pronouns: she/her/hers Section: Friday 3PM - 4PM Wheeler 200 OH: Friday 9AM - 10:30AM Hi everyone! My name is Sharon, and I am an EECS senior from Malaysia. Outside of CS, I currently like singing, watching Merlin, playing Dota, and playing with my dog, Bella. Hope you like 186, and feel free to talk to me about anything! Sarah Liu sarahliu911@berkeley.edu Pronouns: she/her/hers Section: Wednesday 9AM - 10AM Wheeler 220 OH: Tuesday 1:30PM - 2PM, Tuesday 2:30PM - 3:30PM Hi! I’m a 4th year EECS major from SoCal. In my free time I enjoy playing spikeball, hiking, playing board games, and cooking. Looking forward to meeting everyone! Aditi Mahajan aditi.mahajan@berkeley.edu Section: Friday 5PM - 6PM Soda 320 OH: Thursday 3PM - 5PM Hi! I’m a 4th year Math and CS major from the Bay Area. I love to bake (and eat the results) and spent my time the last year hiking the major peaks in the Bay Area. I love this class and am excited for a fun semester :) Gautam Mittal gbm@berkeley.edu Pronouns: he/him/his Section: Thursday 10AM - 11AM Wheeler 204 OH: Thursday 11AM - 12:30PM Hello! I’m a fourth year EECS major from the Bay Area. I like jazz, running, and coconut water. Welcome to 186! Mantej Panesar mantejpanesar@berkeley.edu Section: TBA (Online) OH: Friday 1PM - 3PM Hi everyone! I’m a 4th year CS major from the Bay Area. In my free time, I enjoy exploring new music (feel free to send recommendations my way), hiking, and rewatching episodes of Psych. Looking forward to meeting you all this semester! Aditya Ramkumar aditya.ramkumar@berkeley.edu Pronouns: he/him/his OH: Thursday 6PM - 9PM Hey folks, I’m a 5th year MSCS from Cupertino. Outside of databases, I enjoy trading stocks, baking cookies, and eating Mexican food. Here’s to a great semester! Evelyn Wu evelynpwu@berkeley.edu Pronouns: she/her/hers Section: Wednesday 10AM - 11AM Wheeler 130 OH: Wednesday 1:30PM - 3PM Hello! I’m Evelyn, a third year CS major from Irvine. Really looking forward to meeting you all!! Micah Yong micahtyong@berkeley.edu Pronouns: he/him/his Section: Friday 12PM - 1PM Wheeler 20 OH: Monday 4PM - 5:30PM Hi, I’m Micah! I’m a senior studying computer science from Los Angeles, CA. My interests lie in backend engineering, exploring new cities, reading memoirs, and cooking breakfast! Can’t wait to teach databases with you all :D
